UPDATE DONATE
SET donate_flower = donate_flower + 1
SET donate_love = donate_love + 1
SET donate_see = donate_see + 1
SET donate_pine = donate_pine + 1
SET donate_proud = donate_proud + 1
SET donate_hard = donate_hard + 1
SET donate_sad = donate_sad + 1
WHERE DONATE_IDX = #{donateIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (DONATE_IDX, REPLY_CONTENTS, REPLY_REGDATE) VALUES (#{donateIdx}, #{replyContents}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT Count(*) AS CNT FROM reply WHERE 1 = 1 AND donate_idx = #{idx}
SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(DONATE_DATE, 1, 4) AS YEAR FROM DONATE WHERE DONATE_DATE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY YEAR DESC
SELECT D.* FROM DONATE D WHERE 1 = 1 AND DONATE_IDX = #{idx}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM DONATE WHERE 1 = 1
AND DONATE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{donateName},'%')
AND DATE(DONATE_DATE) >= DATE(#{startDate})
AND DATE(DONATE_DATE) <= DATE(#{endDate})
AND SUBSTRING(DONATE_DATE, 1, 4) = #{searchYear}

SELECT ST.STORY_IDX, ST.STORY_AREA, ST.STORY_GUBUN, ST.STORY_TITLE, ST.STORY_ANONYMITY, ST.STORY_HITS, ST.STORY_CONTENTS, ST.STORY_PASSWORD, ST.STORY_WRITER, ST.STORY_IMG, ST.STORY_ORG_IMG, ST.STORY_REGDATE, ST.DONATE_IDX, DN.DONATE_NAME, DN.DONATE_ANONYMITY FROM STORY ST LEFT OUTER JOIN DONATE DN ON DN.DONATE_IDX = ST.DONATE_IDX WHERE 1 = 1 AND ST.STORY_GUBUN = #{gubun}
AND ST.STORY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND ST.STORY_CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND (ST.STORY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR ST.STORY_CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
AND ST.STORY_IDX < #{idx} ORDER BY ST.STORY_REGDATE DESC
AND ST.STORY_IDX < #{idx} ORDER BY ST.STORY_REGDATE ASC
limit 1
AND ST.STORY_IDX = #{idx}

SELECT COM_IDX, BOD_IDX, COM_REG_NAME, COM_CONTENT, COM_REG_DATE FROM STORY_COMMENT WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_DIV = #{gubun} AND BOD_IDX = #{idx} ORDER BY COM_REG_DATE DESC LIMIT #{beginArticleNum}, #{articleCount}
